rooms.description: Spacious living room with Vastu-compliant placement towards the north-east for positive energy. Features ample natural light through large windows.
Adjacent to the kitchen and living room, promoting social interaction. Placed in a central location for easy access from all parts of the farmhouse.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with dining area. Positioned in the southeast according to Vastu guidelines.
Large master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, positioned towards the north-west for calm and peaceful environment.
Secondary bedroom designed for children or guests. Placed near the central corridor.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort, adheres to Vastu by avoiding alignment with the staircase.
Dedicated servant's quarters integrated into a corner of the villa. Positioned away from main living spaces for privacy.
Additional bathroom facility adjacent to master bedroom and common areas.

openings.description: Main entrance door placed at the south-east corner, welcoming positive energy.
Back door facilitating access to garden and outdoor living areas.
Large windows throughout to enhance natural ventilation and light. Designed per Vastu for proper energy flow.
Open patio doors leading directly into the large garden area, allowing seamless indoor-outdoor living.
